UnifyingAPI
Class UniDevice

java.lang.Object
  UnifyingAPI.UniDevice

public abstract class UniDevice
extends java.lang.Object

A device that implements the Unifying API.

Author:
Greg Clark

Constructor Detail

UniDevice

protected UniDevice(short vendorID,
                    short productID,
                    double frequency)
Device driver devlopers should call this constructor when they subclass UniDevice

Parameters:
vendorID - the USB vendor ID for the device
productID - the USB product ID for the device
frequency - the highest update frequency among all data channels
Method Detail

getSensorPacket

public final byte[] getSensorPacket()
Constructs and returns a new sensor packet as a byte array.

Returns:
the sensor packet

getSensorHeader

public byte[] getSensorHeader()
Retrieves the sensor packet header for this device.

Returns:
the sensor packet header as a byte array

addChannel

protected final void addChannel(UniChannel channel)
Add a UniChannel to the channels list.

Parameters:
channel - the UniChannel to add to the list

updateChannels

protected abstract void updateChannels()
The only function that is necessary for the driver implementors to implement. Adds each channel to the channels list using addChannel().
